pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Python interface to last.fm and other api-compatible websites
Features: * Simple public interface. * Access to all the data exposed by the Last.fm webservices. * Scrobbling support. * Full object-oriented design. * Proxy support. * Internal caching support for some webservices calls (disabled by default). * No extra dependencies but python itself. * Support for other API-compatible networks like Libre.fm * Python3-friendly (Starting from 0.5).
